snippet: A new form requires taxpayers to provide detailed information on their overseas financial accounts, including income derived from them.
abstract: New Internal Revenue Service form requires American taxpayers abroad to provide detailed information on their overseas financial accounts, including income derived from them; penalties for failing to file start at $10,000, and filers are subject to major fines for underreporting, even when innocent errors are made.
lead_paragraph: A new form requires taxpayers to provide detailed information on their overseas financial accounts, including income derived from them.

headline.main: For Americans Abroad, Taxes Just Got More Complicated
headline.print_headline: Law Adds to Tax Burden For Americans Overseas
